content.raw: Hi, I found the reason of this problem. Because the model "mpl_haptix_right_forearm" contains not only the arm but also the hand. Every time when you call function **hxs_set_model_transform**, it resets not only the arm but also the hand, which results in resetting the force that the hand exerts on the object. So we should comment the line which resets the hand position.
